{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Ultra Ball |image = [[File:Ultra Ball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Ultra Ball''. |price =
*2,000 {{pdollar}} *1 {{Battlepoints}} |catchTime = 0.75s |catchRate = 10% |location =
*[[Ultra Ball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Ultra Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] *[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]] *[[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier]] }} ==Description== The '''Ultra Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== An excellent Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it provides a +10% catch rate bonus and catches Pokémon in 0.75 seconds. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations
